titleStmt.title: Directions for the vvorthy receiuing of the Lords Supper with some few questions to the same purpose. By Robert Iension, Batchelor in Diuinity, and Minister of Gods Word, at New-Castle vpon Tine.
titleStmt.author: Jenison, Robert, 1584?-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Purslowe] for Iohn Harrigat, and are to be sold at the Holy Lambe in Pater-noster Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
